suppress.notes:
File name: spring-security-*.jar in combination with Spring Framework 5.0.5.RELEASE
This is a false positive, the issue affects Spring Framework 5.0.5.RELEASE only.

We haven't been paying attention to security issues for a while and these popped up. I am fixing a bug with our code logic and don't want to be upgrading Spring at the same time, so suppressing these issues for now.

We haven't been paying attention to security issues for a while and these popped up. I am fixing a bug with our code logic and don't want to be upgrading the Keycloak adapter at the same time, so suppressing these issues for now.
